pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Sunday, February 9, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Addis Ababa, Ethiopia

8:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Madagascar, Andry Rajoelina.

Meeting Room 2, Ground Floor
Hyatt Regency Addis Ababa

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Mauritius, Pravind Jugnauth.

Meeting Room 2, Ground Floor
Hyatt Regency Addis Ababa

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

9:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari.

Meeting Room 2, Ground Floor
Hyatt Regency Addis Ababa

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

10:50 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Ethiopian women entrepreneurs

Yod Abyssinia

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Effoi Hotel

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the African Union dinner for heads of state and heads of government.

Terrace
Menelik Palace

Note for media:

  • Official photographers only
